import React from 'react'; const TermsConditions = () => { const effectiveDate = 'April 22, 2023'; const jurisdiction = 'Warsaw, Poland'; const contactInfo = 'contact@projecttrek.com'; return (

Terms & Conditions for ProjectTrek

Effective date: {effectiveDate}

Welcome to ProjectTrek, a web application that allows you to manage your projects and collaborate with your team. By using our web application, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions:

Acceptance of Terms & Conditions

These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our web application. By using our application, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms & Conditions, you may not use our web application.

Use of Web Application

You may use our web application for your personal or business purposes, subject to these Terms & Conditions. You may not use our application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in any way that violates these Terms & Conditions.

Registration and Account Security

To use our web application, you must register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You are also responsible for any activities that occur under your account. If you suspect unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately.

Payment

We may offer paid subscriptions for our web application. If you choose to purchase a subscription, you agree to pay the subscription fee and any applicable taxes. We may change the subscription fee at any time, but we will notify you in advance of any changes.

Intellectual Property

Our web application and its contents, including text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of ProjectTrek and its licensors. You may not use our web application or its contents for any commercial purpose without our express written permission.

User Content

You may post or upload content to our web application, such as project data and messages. By posting or uploading content, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, copy, modify, distribute, and display the content.

Termination

We may terminate your access to our web application at any time for any reason, including if you violate these Terms & Conditions. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

Disclaimer of Warranties

Our web application is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not warrant that our web application will be error-free or uninterrupted, or that any defects will be corrected. You use our web application at your own risk.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall ProjectTrek or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our web application, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

Changes to Terms & Conditions

We may update these Terms & Conditions from time to time by posting a new version on our website. We encourage you to review these Terms & Conditions periodically for any changes.

Governing Law

These Terms & Conditions and your use of our web application are governed by the laws of {jurisdiction}. Any legal action arising out of or in connection with these Terms & Conditions or your use of our web application shall be brought exclusively in the courts of {jurisdiction}.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions or our web application, please contact us at {contactInfo}.

) }
